data.comment: The match is underway. Nottingham have kicked-off.
Samba Sow is booked for the away team.
In the minute 45, Jakob Lungi Sorensen is on target to give Norwich a 1-0 advantage.
The second half is underway in Norwich - Norwich with the kick-off.
In the minute 54, Oliver Skipp (Norwich) gets a yellow card.
Emiliano Buendia (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Chris Hughton is making the team's first substitution at Carrow Road with Miguel Angel Guerrero replacing Lyle Taylor.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Harry Arter with Anthony Knockaert. This is the second substitution made today by Chris Hughton.
Anthony Knockaert levels the score at 1-1.
Norwich's Max Aarons has been booked in Norwich.
In the minute 77, Norwich take a 2-1 lead thanks to Emiliano Buendia.
Alexander Tettey is replacing Marco Stiepermann for Norwich at Carrow Road.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a second substitution, with Todd Cantwell replacing Josh Martin.
In the minute 83, Kenny McLean is replacing Emiliano Buendia for the home team.
Todd Cantwell for Norwich has been booked by Darren Bond and receives a first yellow card.
The match has come to a close in Norwich. The final score is 2-1.
Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a fourth substitution, with Tyrese Omotoye replacing Teemu Pukki.
